[DQC.IFRS.0126.9595] The statement [520000] Statement of cash flows, indirect method includes an inconsistent calculation. The value of the concept ifrs-full:CashFlowsFromUsedInFinancingActivities of -23,892,000 should be equal to the sum of its child components defined in the calculation linkbase. The sum of these child components is 23,892,000. The values of the addends is determined by adding the values of the child concepts with a decimal value of -3. All values in the financial statements should use the same decimal value. The values reported in the financial statement in the current reporting period of 2020-04-24 to 2021-04-23 should be complete if the financial statement is to be mathematically accurate and complete. The components of ifrs-full:CashFlowsFromUsedInFinancingActivities that should add to -23,892,000 are comprised of the following:
- ZahlungenImZusammenhangMitDemNachrang-UndErgänzungskapital -8,951,000 - DividendsPaidClassifiedAsFinancingActivities -10,000 - InterestPaidClassifiedAsFinancingActivities -13,620,000 - PaymentsOfLeaseLiabilitiesClassifiedAsFinancingActivities -1,311,000
The addends are calculated based on the calculation linkbase defined for [520000] Statement of cash flows, indirect method. If addends are missing then the calculation tree should be amended. The rule will not add dimension components as the financial statement does not include a table. If dimensions are used on the statement then add a table to ensure that the dimensions are defined correctly.
Total Element : ifrs-full:CashFlowsFromUsedInFinancingActivities Total Value : -23,892,000 Total period : 2020-04-24 to 2021-04-23 Dimensions : Decimals : -3 Rule Element Id:9595 Rule version: 17.0.2 - https://filings.xbrl.org/529900L7QSUOI52K6094/2021-04-23/ESEF/AT/0/Jahresfinanzbericht2020.zip/Jahresfinanzbericht2020/reports/esef20q4-2021-04-23.html 38367

[DQC.IFRS.0126.9595] The statement [520000] Statement of cash flows, indirect method includes an inconsistent calculation. The value of the concept ifrs-full:CashFlowsFromUsedInOperatingActivities of 928,841,000 should be equal to the sum of its child components defined in the calculation linkbase. The sum of these child components is 1,132,703,000. The values of the addends is determined by adding the values of the child concepts with a decimal value of -3. All values in the financial statements should use the same decimal value. The values reported in the financial statement in the current reporting period of 2020-04-24 to 2021-04-23 should be complete if the financial statement is to be mathematically accurate and complete. The components of ifrs-full:CashFlowsFromUsedInOperatingActivities that should add to 928,841,000 are comprised of the following:
+ AnpassungenFürDieAbnahmeZunahmeVonAlsZurVeräußerungGehaltenerLangfristigerVermögenswerte 4,635,000 + AnpassungenFürDieAbnahmeZunahmeVonDarlehenUndKreditenAmortizedCost -443,078,000 + AnpassungenFürDieAbnahmeZunahmeVonDarlehenUndKreditenFairValueNon-SPPI 12,949,000 + AnpassungenFürDieAbnahmeZunahmeVonDarlehenUndKreditenFairValueOption -15,231,000 + AnpassungenFürDieAbnahmeZunahmeVonErtragsteueransprüchen 0 + AnpassungenFürDieAbnahmeZunahmeVonRückstellungen -1,917,000 + AnpassungenFürDieErfolgswirksamErfassteAbschreibungWertaufholungFinanzinstrumente 17,834,000 + AnpassungenFürDieZunahmeAbnahmeVonErtragssteuerverpflichtungen -967,000 + AnpassungenFürDieZunahmeAbnahmeVonNichtNachrangigenVerbindlichkeitenAmortizedCost 1,410,541,000 + AnpassungenFürDieZunahmeAbnahmeVonNichtNachrangigenVerbindlichkeitenFairValueOption -102,723,000 + AdjustmentsForDecreaseIncreaseInFinancialAssetsHeldForTrading 27,000 + AdjustmentsForDecreaseIncreaseInOtherAssets 23,350,000 + AdjustmentsForImpairmentLossReversalOfImpairmentLossRecognisedInProfitOrLossPropertyPlantAndEquipment 8,912,000 + AdjustmentsForIncreaseDecreaseInOtherLiabilities -15,312,000 + AdjustmentsForProvisions 42,990,000 - IncomeTaxesPaidRefundClassifiedAsOperatingActivities -25,168,000 - InterestPaidClassifiedAsOperatingActivities -76,763,000 + InterestReceivedClassifiedAsOperatingActivities 232,504,000 + OtherAdjustmentsForWhichCashEffectsAreInvestingOrFinancingCashFlow -27,563,000 + OtherAdjustmentsToReconcileProfitLoss -153,510,000 + ProfitLoss 37,331,000
The addends are calculated based on the calculation linkbase defined for [520000] Statement of cash flows, indirect method. If addends are missing then the calculation tree should be amended. The rule will not add dimension components as the financial statement does not include a table. If dimensions are used on the statement then add a table to ensure that the dimensions are defined correctly.

[DQC.IFRS.0126.9595] The statement [520000] Statement of cash flows, indirect method includes an inconsistent calculation. All values in the financial statements should use the same decimal value.
